column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was my first deep dish experience and I was not disappointed at all. The pizza was excellent from the crust to the filling
column2: paired well with an ice cold coke. Even though the wait time was quite long
column3: it was amazing of them to have a system where you could put in your pizza order so when you sat down you barely waited. That was super clutch. I would recommend this place to tourists for sure.
